title: OPL Champ Select Music
body: Does anyone know the current champ select music in the OPL? I can't find it anywhere.

replies.body:
Hey Icemaush,

The track is called 'Glitch Lab' by John 00 Fleming.
Awesome! Thanks so much. Love this song. :)
Try use soundhound or ask siri what the song is. Usually the LoL regions traditionally have always used their own licensed music, but OPL is probably different.
